A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very simple: \"Empire Strikes Back\" is at the top. And right below it is \"The Last Jedi\"!!! In my humble opinion; This was so satisfying\, so gratifying\, and just amazing!! This time around\, I decided to stay away from all the spoilers and rumors (I should've done that with \"Force Awakens\" and \"Rogue One\") and went in as a fan of the franchise\, but more importantly as a fan of Movies in general. I'm not a critic nor an \"expert\" but I can tell you that Rian Johnson did a hell of a job!!!! It was a rollercoaster of emotions!! Hopefully J.J. Abrams will pick up where Rian left off and end the Skywalker saga with a bang!!! The franchise is in good hands\, Rian Johnson just gave us a taste of what his \"New Trilogy\" is gonna be like. But don't take my word for it\, nor the negative reviews either.....GO SEE IT!!!!!!!!
